comment.author: 31324280@N02
comment._content: Australians.... It appears there are two vessels lying alongside one another - double funnels nearby and one further in the distance. Noteworthy is the dazzle paint camouflage scheme painted on them. No idea where this is, but a guess says Marseilles judging by the  buildings and the light. But a pure guess!

comment.author: 45342321@N04
comment._content: I agree with fulvue, the two men in slouch hats appear to the Australians.

comment.author: 54451837@N02
comment._content: I think this was taken in Boulogne sur mer rather!
